# HEP Cars Renovation Program Market Day

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: MX-42935161906
* **Solicitation Number**: 20231110
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-06T16:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-28
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-02-28

### Tender Description

VIA Rail Canada Inc. is hosting a Market Day for the proposed HEP Cars Renovation Program. This event is scheduled to take place in Q1 2024 at VIA's Montreal Maintenance Centre. During this all-day event, participants will have the opportunity to:

* Receive a presentation on the program and the railcars
* Learn more about the scope of work
* Engage in discussions with VIA representatives

Interested prime contractors are invited to attend this event to gain a deeper understanding of the program and its requirements.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: N/A

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Jean-François Daviault
* **Email**: jean-francois_daviault@viarail.ca
* **Phone**: 514-871-6702

### Tender Documentation

* Bidding and documents are available on Merx.com
* Fees may apply; please refer to Merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
